original_title: Grade 5 scholarship exam on October 15: Exam. Dept.
original_body_lines: The Examination Department today announced the date for the 2023 Grade Five Scholarship Examination.
Accordingly, the examination will be conducted on October 15 (Sunday). Calling applications for the exam will start today, and the closing date for accepting applications will be July 15.
Submitting applications online will not be accepted after midnight on July 6, and the department also announced that the application acceptance date will not be extended in any case.
Candidates from government-approved private schools are only permitted to submit the applications.
The scholarships will be awarded to low-income students who fulfill their age requirement of less than 11 years or more than 10-years.
The Department requested that the applicants visit the official website at http://onlineexams.gov.lk/eic.  (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
